creator: Media Station
description:
Extreme Tactics is a real-time wargame where your choices of vehicle design, AI, strategy, and tactics will determine whether your clan lives or dies.

Extreme Tactics  is set on the dying planet of Calibria, where two rival clans are battling for control over a dwindling supply of coolar crystals--the sole source of energy on the planet.  Each clan operates an arsenal of deadly war machines from within Mobile Command Centers on the planet's surface.  In general, the idealistic Hammerhawk clan makes heavier use of flying and walking vehicles, while the tyrannical Bloodfox clan prefers more conventional, land-based vehicles.  Once you choose a clan to fight  for, you control the types and capabilities of vehicles in your arsenal, and can personalize your forces in a way unmatched by any other real-time strategy game.
subject: Windows games; Vintage computer games; Strategy games
title: Extreme Tactics Demo
